game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Your mission is to penetrate the fortress of the enemy, overcome their guards, and retrieve the ancient artifact that has been lost for centuries.

task.description: To gain entry to the fortress, you will need to find the secret entrance hidden in the nearby forest.
You will face formidable enemies. Prepare for an epic combat.
The artifact is said to be in a hidden room deep within the fortress. You must find it and return it safely.
